name: ORD_AUD_RESULT_ROUT_RCPT
description: This table contains the auditing information about the results routing recipients.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUD_RESULT_ROUTING_RCPT
columns.description: This column contains the auditing information about the results routing recipients. The data is in a carat delimited string of the form, "INI^ID^Recipient Name^System Flag".  The source item is located at ORDER_RAD_RECPNT.CC_RECIPIENTS_LIST.
